item.description: Meet at Cutler Park at 9:30 AM .It's easy to find (click on map above) and has good parking.  Weather looks awesome. We will cycle 15-20 miles on quiet roads into Needham-Dover at a moderate pace, 10-13 mph.  Any bike will work - road, hybrid.. Those interested can go to Panera for coffee http://g.co/maps/fmbr.... ; if you email me, I am happy to exchange cell phone info. Meet at 9:30 at the Trail Stand, depart by 9:45.
item.name: Cutler Park, Cycling country roads Mon Oct 10
